pages.text: Artifacts can be upgraded using artifact exp, or be converted into artifact exp. Each artifact will have 2 numbers in its tooltip: the amount of artifact exp to reach the next level, and the amount of artifact exp it can be used as.$(br2)High level artifacts can conserve most of the artifact exp consumed when converted to exp, so don't worry about upgrading bad artifacts in early game.
Use Artifact Pocket for storing artifacts, converting them to exp, storing artifact exp, and upgrading artifacts.
